typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as string,
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{ID contrat} as string,
		{ID levier} as string,
		{Max ID Seuil} as string,
		{Contrepartie seuil} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> seuil
source(output(
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{ID contrat} as string,
		{ID levier} as string,
		year as string,
		ca as string,
		{Réalisé} as string,
		{Somme quantité} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> remuneration
seuil, remuneration join(seuil@{ID contrat cadre} == remuneration@{ID contrat cadre}
	&& seuil@{ID contrat} == remuneration@{ID contrat}
	&& seuil@{ID levier} == remuneration@{ID levier}
	&& seuil@year == remuneration@year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoin
Union derive({Rémunération} = toDouble({Réalisé})*toDouble({Contrepartie seuil})) ~> remunerationColumn
innerJoin select(mapColumn(
		year = seuil@year,
		{ID contrat cadre} = seuil@{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat} = seuil@{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = seuil@{ID levier},
		{ID Seuil} = {Max ID Seuil},
		{Contrepartie seuil},
		ca,
		{quantité} = {Somme quantité},
		{Réalisé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
seuil, remuneration join(seuil@{ID contrat cadre} == remuneration@{ID contrat cadre}
	&& seuil@{ID contrat} == remuneration@{ID contrat}
	&& seuil@{ID levier} == remuneration@{ID levier}
	&& seuil@year == remuneration@year,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftJoin
fullLeftJoin filter(isNull(remuneration@{ID contrat cadre}) && isNull(remuneration@{ID contrat}) && isNull(remuneration@{ID levier}) && isNull(remuneration@year)) ~> dropInner
dropInner select(mapColumn(
		year = seuil@year,
		{ID contrat cadre} = seuil@{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat} = seuil@{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = seuil@{ID levier},
		{ID Seuil} = {Max ID Seuil},
		{Contrepartie seuil},
		ca,
		{Réalisé},
		{Somme quantité}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsLeft
dropColumns, dropColumnsLeft union(byName: true)~> Union
remunerationColumn derive({Contrepartie seuil} = replace({Contrepartie seuil}, ".", ","),
		ca = replace(ca, ".", ","),
		{Réalisé} = replace({Réalisé}, ".", ","),
		{Rémunération} = replace(toString({Rémunération}), ".", ",")) ~> formatDecimal
formatDecimal select(mapColumn(
		year,
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{ID Seuil},
		{Contrepartie seuil},
		ca,
		{quantité},
		{Réalisé},
		{Rémunération}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CONTRAT_DISTRIBUTION.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CONTRATDISTRIBUTION
